enumDescriptions.Drive: Specifies an  device type of Drive, indicating a NVMe device that presents as an NVMe SSD device.
enumDescriptions.FabricAttachArray: Specifies an  NVMe device type of FabricAttachArray, indicating a NVMe device that presents an NVMe front-end that abstracts the back end storage, typically with multiple options for availability and protection.
enumDescriptions.JBOF: Specifies an  device type of JBOF, indicating a NVMe device that presents as an NVMe smart enclosure for NVMe devices, typically NVMe Drives.

enumLongDescriptions.Drive: Specifies an  device type of Drive, indicating a NVMe device that presents as an NVMe SSD device.
enumLongDescriptions.FabricAttachArray: Specifies an  NVMe device type of FabricAttachArray, indicating a NVMe device that presents an NVMe front-end that abstracts the back end storage, typically with multiple options for availability and protection.
enumLongDescriptions.JBOF: Specifies an  device type of JBOF, indicating a NVMe device that presents as an NVMe smart enclosure for NVMe devices, typically NVMe Drives.

NVMeDomain.description: This is the schema definition for domain.
NVMeDomain.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a domain for a Redfish implementation.

NVMeFirmwareImage.description: This is the schema definition for NVMe Domain firmware image properties.
NVMeFirmwareImage.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a the NVMe Domain firmware image properties.

title: #NVMeDomain.NVMeFirmwareImage
